document_data.name: Skewered Dragon
document_data.mainbody: The '''Skewered Dragon''' was a tavern in [[Waterdeep]] ''circa'' the [[1491 DR|Year of the Scarlet Witch, 1491 DR]]. The clientele was primarily made up of dock workers that were suspicious of strangers.
document_data.Location: This establishment was on an alley that ran between [[Net Street (south)|Net Street]] and [[Fillet Lane]] in the [[Dock Ward of Waterdeep]], just around the corner and a few doors down from the [[Old Xoblob Shop]].
document_data.Structure: The Skewered Dragon was in very  poor shape. Both front windows were broken and the roof groaned under the weight of a ship's anchor that punctured it.
